Detailed Description

template<typename T, typename Traits = raw_ptr_traits>
class v8pp::class_< T, Traits >

Interface to access C++ classes bound to V8.

Member Function Documentation

◆ reference_external()

template<typename T, typename Traits = raw_ptr_traits>
static v8::Local<v8::Object> v8pp::class_< T, Traits >::reference_external ( v8::Isolate *  isolate,
object_pointer_type const &  ext 
)
inlinestatic

Create JavaScript object which references externally created C++ class. It will not take ownership of the C++ pointer.

◆ import_external()

template<typename T, typename Traits = raw_ptr_traits>
static v8::Local<v8::Object> v8pp::class_< T, Traits >::import_external ( v8::Isolate *  isolate,
object_pointer_type const &  ext 
)
inlinestatic

As reference_external but delete memory for C++ object when JavaScript object is deleted. You must use factory<T>::create() to allocate ext
